name: Executor
description: Represents an Executor VM or bare-metal machine, which can host multiple service instances

address.description: The IP address or hostname on which the API server and gateway can access this executor

APIPort.description: The port this executor is listening on for API commands

totalCapacity.description: The number of containers/service instances that this executor can support

accessToken.description: Access token that identified the executor

schedToken.description: Access token that identifies the scheduler to the executor
